title: DIY map
name: DIY map
description:
A Map by Workbook

A listing of theaters and venues that can have digital projection and are interested in booking independent work.

properties.name: AFI SilverAFI Silver Theatre and Cultural Center
properties.description: Posted by Workbook Silver Spring, MDAFI Silver Theatre and Cultural Center 8633 Colesville Road Silver Spring, MD 20910 Screens: 3 Digital Screens: 3 (400+) (200+) (75) Digital Projection: YES - RCA, S-video, component, various digital Playback: DVD to HD Sound: stereo, surround sound Booking: theater is open to rental call for details Contact: Phone: 301.495.6720 Fax: 301.495.6777 Site: http://www.afi.com/silver Rating: Notes: The \'06 self-distributed project Jumping Off Bridges played there.

Open on weekends.

properties.name: All-of-us Express
properties.description: Posted by Workbook All-of-us Express is youth creating quality theater. Young people ages 6-18 do all of the acting, costuming, makeup application, set design and construction, lighting and sound work with supervision from theater professionals.

properties.description: Posted by Bombit New York, NY Screen #1 capacity: 170 seats projection: 35 mm, 16 mm, digital video sound: Dolby Digital CP500 Screen #2 capacity: 67 seats projection: 35 mm, 16 mm, digital video sound: Dolby Surround CP45 Screen #3 capacity: 73 seats projection: 35 mm sound: Dolby Surround CP45 (718) 268-0755 villagescreen@cinemavillage.com

properties.name: Clinton Street Theater
properties.description: Posted by Bombit Portland, OR 97202A landmark of Portland cinema history, The Clinton Street Theater is one of the oldest operating moviehouses in the United States. Famous for its long-standing exhibition of the Rocky Horror Picture Show, the theater is currently a magnet for independent / revival films. In Fall of 2003, the Clinton Street Theater was purchased by Seth and Nicola Sonstein. The Clinton is available for event rental and screenings. Contact Seth for more details.

properties.name: Living Room Theaters
properties.description: Posted by Pdxmhatter    Six intimate Living Room® Theaters. High-definition digital movie projection. Attentive in-theater service right up until the film begins. Plush recliners, private tables and chairs. Sleek café. Cool bar. Free Wi-Fi.
